title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Fireworks in MSFS 2020
description:
New Years eve comes soon this year in MSFS 2020. With this addon you can add firework to MSFS 2020. During multiple times a year and specific timeslots you will see firework in MSFS 2020. 

Below a list of where you can see fireworks and when:

- 31 Dec - New Year's Eve - 
  All around the World. Starts after dark around 20.00. 
  Main displays from 22.00 till 1.30

- Everyday - Disney World/Land, Florida and California - 21.30-21.45
- 01 Feb (2022) - Chinese New Year - China - 0:00-6:00
- 16 May - My wife's birthday - Somewhere in Poland ;) - 20.00-22.30
- 04 Jul - USA Independence Day - USA - 20.00-0.00
- 14 Jul - Bastille Day - official displays in France - 22.00-0.00
- 01 Aug - Swiss National Day - Switzerland - 22.00-0.00
- 18 Aug - MSFS anniversary - Asobo HQ - 20.00-22.30
- 20 Aug - St. Stephen's Day - bigger cities in Hungary - 21.00-23.00
- 24 Oct (2022) - Diwali - India - 20.00-0.00
- 05 Nov - Guy Fawkes Day - United Kingdom - 19.00-22.00
- 11 Nov - Polish Independence Day - bigger cities in Poland - 20.00-22.00 
- 30 Nov - St. Andrews Day - Scotland - 19.30-21.00
- 24 Dec - Christmas Eve - Peru - 22.00-2.00

If you would like to give the addon a try yourself visit the site below to download it:
https://flightsim.to/file/24818/we-love-vfr-xtra-fireworks
